post.body: g'night Karen. Merry Christmas. May it be blessed!
LOVE that movie. Watched it last week.
Sippy cup!? You crack me up.
Hooray for you!!
Sorry about the bad day. Hope your mom can help smooth out the rough time for you.
my sentiments exactly. Sometime before Christmas perhaps.
Thanks! I really really hope so too. Prayers appreciated.
uh-oh! You know if you leave 'em there - they're going to mutliply like bunnies. ;-)
Teenagers are an adventure. A downright white-knuckled ride at times. Hang in there.
You totally crack me up! I think we need pictures of you in your princess jammies.
Late joining in but give The Boy a GREAT BIG HELLO! for me. Hope he's feeling better soon. I'm sure time w/mom helps.
Great. We'll be right over to eat a few (dozen) cookies. You weren't making them for someone, right?
Congrats! Good for you!
Tomorrow my boy celebrates his first Christmas in our family.
Watched "It's a Wonderful Life" tonight. What a classic movie.
Daughter's driver's test postponed until tomorrow. So frustrated.
Clean laundry all over the living room.Today will be the day that someone drops by.Think they'll believe the clothes are x-mas decorations?
eldest daughter has gone off to get her driver's license. Prayers appreciated!
Left my kids alone with Photo Booth. There are now 228 pictures in here. Some of these are hilarious.
Am I the only one tempted to eat a spoonful of Sweetened Condensed Milk right from the can? I am? Ok, I knew I was weird.
